ygData.subject: Arriving at the moon.

"Psst! Hey Fliq, get up. I need you."

Fliq stirred and opened his eyes. Out of th efront of the shuttle was 
the moon, looking gigantic. And on the surface could be seen the 
wreck of the Maximal battle cruiser Mosquition.

"I need you to plot the landing course."

"Huh?Wha?Oh yeah. Okay, I did this already...it's in here 
somewhere...Aha! There you go. We land in the remnants of the crushed 
crator, just to the right of the ship."

"Alright. Ramulus you better hang on, cause if you thought take off 
was harsh, the landing's gonna kill you."

Brix tlted the ship towards the moon. Once he got a bit closer he put 
the put the bottom of the ship exactly square with the landing site, 
and since it was on the bottom side of the moon, the bots fell like 
they were upside down! Then Brix just dropped, or went up, depending 
on the way you want to look at it.. It felt like they were going to 
crash. But just before they hit the moon, Brix fired th engine sin 
the other direction a small bit, and the floated down easily. Gravity 
over took them and the upside down feeling went away. Brix turned to 
look at Ramulus.

"Now, the main things we need are hull, weapons and and computer 
boards. Which ones do you want to get?"
